tips:
• Qualify for reduced fare and each Metro trip would only cost $1.

  • With reduced-fare capping you would never pay more than $3 a day or $8 a week. Every ride after would be FREE.

  • With regular-fare capping you would never pay more than $6 a day or $20 a week.
